snippet: A security guard in Somalia’s semiautonomous Puntland region shot to death two consultants working for the United Nations shortly after they had landed at the Galkayo airport on Monday, officials said.
abstract: Security guard in Somalia's semiautonomous Puntland region shoots to death two United Nations consultants shortly after they land at Galkayo airport.
lead_paragraph: A security guard in Somalia’s semiautonomous Puntland region shot to death two consultants working for the United Nations shortly after they had landed at the Galkayo airport on Monday, officials said.
